00042 #ifdef HAVE_VISIBILITY_ATTRIBUTE

00045 void R_init_lme4(DllInfo *dll)
00046 {
00047     R_registerRoutines(dll, NULL, CallEntries, NULL, NULL);
00048     R_useDynamicSymbols(dll, FALSE);
00049 
00050 
00051     M_R_cholmod_start(&c);
00052     c.final_ll = 1;         /* LL' form of simplicial factorization */
00053 
00054     lme4_ASym = install("A");
00055     lme4_CmSym = install("Cm");
